name: Gravity Shift (lukr)
description:
Gravity Shift

Traverse the underground and find treasure by shifting gravity and falling in the right direction. But watch out for spikes and falling blocks!

Controls: Arrow keys or tapping the left or right side of the screen.

I wrote a blog post about my reasoning when coming up with the game:

https://www.lukasisaksson.se/blog/game-design-breakdown-gravity-shift
